channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Customer Reviews

item.title: CVE-2024-1849|2024-08-01T18:56:22.286Z -- unknown -- wp%20customer%20reviews
item.description: The WP Customer Reviews WordPress plugin before 3.7.1 does not validate a parameter allowing contributor and above users to redirect a page to a malicious URL
